name: GPokr - smiley face
description: Works on GPokr. Changes the avatars of ALL players sitting at a table to smiley faces.
additional_info: You don't really need this userstyle because if you don't want to see a player's avatar you can just click on the avatar to change it to a smiley face, but this saves you from ever seeing them. Any of them. Also available on greasyfork.org
